mapper.select: SELECT ALGO_ID, ALGO_CODE, ALGO_NAME, HANDLE_CLASS, ALGO_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK FROM mkt_algorithms

SELECT ALGO_ID, ALGO_CODE, ALGO_NAME, HANDLE_CLASS, ALGO_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK FROM mkt_algorithms WHERE ALGO_ID = #{algoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update:
UPDATE mkt_algorithms SET ALGO_ID = #{algoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ALGO_CODE = #{algoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALGO_NAME = #{algoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HANDLE_CLASS = #{handleClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALGO_DESC = #{algoDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE ALGO_ID = #{algoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT ALGO_ID, ALGO_CODE, ALGO_NAME, HANDLE_CLASS, ALGO_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK FROM mkt_algorithms
and ALGO_ID = #{algoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and ALGO_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{algoName}),'%')
order by UPDATE_DATE desc
